creator: paul_angie@yahoo.com
text:
My machine is connected through Cable modem - hence has a dynamic ip address.  
When I installed apache and try to start the server - I get an error saying 
that Apache2 service is not found.  Also in the monitor - the start and stop 
buttons are disabled.

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
Please ask this question on a user-support group such as the users@httpd.apache.org
mailing list.
